setup.name: selected_scopes
setup.label: Scopes
setup.message: Add comma seperated scopes for accessing Strava's api endpoints

type.text: Type of activity. For example - Run, Ride etc

sport_type.text: Sport type of activity. For example - Run, MountainBikeRide, Ride, etc

trainer.text: Set to 1 to mark as a trainer activity

commute.text: Set to 1 to mark as commute

meta.description: Creates a manual activity for an athlete, requires activity:write scope.
Returns the given activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

page_size.text: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30

after_cursor.text: Cursor of the last item in the previous page of results, used to request the subsequent page of results. When omitted, the first page of results is fetched

meta.description: Returns the comments on the given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

per_page.text: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30

meta.description: Returns the athletes who kudoed an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.
Returns the laps of an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

before.text: An epoch timestamp to use for filtering activities that have taken place before a certain time

after.text: An epoch timestamp to use for filtering activities that have taken place after a certain time

meta.description: Returns the activities of an athlete for a specific identifier. Requires activity:read. Only Me activities will be filtered out unless requested by a token with activity:read_all.
Summit Feature. Returns the zones of a given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.
Updates the given activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires activity:write. Also requires activity:read_all in order to update Only Me activities
Returns the currently authenticated athlete. Tokens with profile:read_all scope will receive a detailed athlete representation; all others will receive a summary representation.
Returns the the authenticated athlete's heart rate and power zones. Requires profile:read_all.

id.text: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete
The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete

meta.description: Returns the activity stats of an athlete. Only includes data from activities set to Everyone visibilty.

weight.text: The weight of the athlete in kilograms
The weight of the athlete in kilograms

meta.description: Update the currently authenticated athlete. Requires profile:write scope.

Retrieve recent activities from members of a specific club. The authenticated athlete must belong to the requested club in order to hit this endpoint. Pagination is supported. Athlete profile visibility is respected for all activities.
Returns a list of the administrators of a given club.
Returns a given club using its identifier.
Returns a list of the athletes who are members of a given club.
Returns a list of the clubs whose membership includes the authenticated athlete.
Returns an equipment using its identifier.
Returns a GPX file of the route. Requires read_all scope for private routes.
Returns a TCX file of the route. Requires read_all scope for private routes.
Returns a route using its identifier. Requires read_all scope for private routes.
Returns a list of the routes created by the authenticated athlete. Private routes are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.
Returns a set of the authenticated athlete's segment efforts for a given segment. Requires subscription.

id.text: The identifier of the segment effort
The identifier of the segment effort

meta.description: Returns a segment effort from an activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires subscription.

bounds.text: The latitude and longitude for two points describing a rectangular boundary for the search: [southwest corner latitutde, southwest corner longitude, northeast corner latitude, northeast corner longitude]

activity_type.text: Desired activity type. May take one of the following values: running, riding

meta.description: Returns the top 10 segments matching a specified query.
List of the authenticated athlete's starred segments. Private segments are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.
Returns the specified segment. read_all scope required in order to retrieve athlete-specific segment information, or to retrieve private segments.

id.text: The identifier of the segment to star

starred.text: If true, star the segment; if false, unstar the segment

id.text: The identifier of the segment to star

meta.description: Stars/Unstars the given segment for the authenticated athlete. Requires profile:write scope.
Returns the given activity's streams. Requires activity:read scope. Requires activity:read_all scope for Only Me activities.
Returns the given route's streams. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

id.text: The identifier of the segment effort
The identifier of the segment effort

meta.description: Returns a set of streams for a segment effort completed by the authenticated athlete. Requires read_all scope.
Returns the given segment's streams. Requires read_all scope for private segments.

name.text: The desired name of the resulting activity

description.text: The desired description of the resulting activity

trainer.text: Whether the resulting activity should be marked as having been performed on a trainer

commute.text: Whether the resulting activity should be tagged as a commute

data_type.text: The format of the uploaded file. May take one of the following values: fit, fit.gz, tcx, tcx.gz, gpx, gpx.g

external_id.text: The desired external identifier of the resulting activity

meta.description: Uploads a new data file to create an activity from. Requires activity:write scope.
Returns an upload for a given identifier. Requires activity:write scope.
